newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $420 mln for Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $420 mln for Thursday.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for Thursday, May 22 are expected to total $420 million in 22 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $353 million in seven sales, with a $209 million Metropolitian Washington Airport, D.C., deal through Lehman Brothers is topping the list.
On the competitive side, 15 sales totaling $67 million are on the schedule. A $18 million Austin, Texas, issue at 1300 EDT is the largest.
An additional two sales totaling $23 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the issues Thursday depending on market conditions.
